channel.title: Contrast - Your Adventure
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fFQI48O.png[/img]
What makes a PvP server stand out? What makes a PvP server unique from the rest? What makes a PvP server perfect? The answer to these questions are different for each player. So how is it possible to make a server perfect for everyone? It isn't. Contrast is not a server that will be perfect, no it will not make each and every player happy, but what it will be is a server that strives to accommodate each and every player. With toggles for almost everything, fun achievements, flawless combat, unique features, Contrast will be a server that is the closet to being perfect. Unlike many server's that ignore the complaints and requests of players, our staff team will be dedicated to ensure that each player's voice will be heard. Contrast is the next up and coming server that will be the home to many!
[B][SIZE=5]The Idea Behind Contrast[/SIZE][/B]
The idea for Contrast is simple and yet unique. Many successful private servers usually have two or more worlds (World 1 - Eco - World 2 - PvP). It is also common knowledge that eco servers strive more than pvp servers. With this being in mind we have decided to revolutionize this by making two worlds in one. Upon login a player will be able to set all of his combat statistics to the max level, however non-combat skills must be trained. The player will login in a world 1 which is eco, players are able to sell their items, battle fierce bosses, skill, troll, and whatever they please. However, if the player decides to type ::pvp (most likely going to change it from a command) then then the world around them will be all PvP. If another player is in this PvP mode they will be able to battle eachother, while if someone else is in eco they will not be able to interact with eachother.
[B][SIZE=5]Development Team[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img]Play Boy - Server/Client Developer/Project Leader [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img]Eclipse - Server/Client Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img]FrostBit3 - Server/Client Developer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img]Oliver Sykes - Forums Developer & Graphic Designer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qbBzWn4.png[/img] - CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR CLIENT DEVELOPER. APPLY BELOW.
[B][SIZE=5]Server Completion:[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://www.yarntomato.com/percentbarmaker/button.php?barPosition=10&leftFill=%2300CC00[/img]
[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]
* 474 Maps/Graphics/Animations/Items/NPCs * Netty Framework * Grahams RS2Server Game Engine * Perfect Switching * Bank Pins
[B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8EaMjui.png[/img] [IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/1309/4y6p.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/416e3f22e65496db6c0ccaee9a89fa1e.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/49197d601a6a567edfa994153a0a6045.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/2f05de8c0feae113d7037ff07d1c142e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7fTVmRf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zb3HK6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MVxeuyZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ie6Jo2f.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/56babc7f13c74a2939789d95aa287df9.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/a044b95d1f71c80ef40e3d0abd662c64.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uFqbVj0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TJlUWs0.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7RvCEfx.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j9bcrrX.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zXs1DCN.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ruRw3WW.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xCqLiq1.gif[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q1vEbjr7fpM&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [B][SIZE=5]Credits[/SIZE][/B]
* Play Boy * Eclipse * FrostBit3 * Oliver Sykes * Senpai * Jason * Eliminate [/FONT][/CENTER]

item.title: Contrast - Your Adventure
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Haha, that’s why I love you, Ruby.

@OT:
Your “teaser” video is just a couple of pking clips. Boy, does that ever want to make me play! Also, your “::pvp” command - it’s unoriginal. It’s been done hundreds of times before. And you know what? The servers that did that never amounted to anything. I’m not trying to bash on you or anything, but it seems like you’re going to attempt to build a large community with this server, my assumption from reading the thread, and there’s not many servers that will ever amount to anything if it’s not a newer-revision. Or with newer content. RuneScape private server players aren’t what they used to be. However, if you do manage to get this being unique (which it’s not at the moment), then I will give it a shot and hop on to see all the content and what not. I won’t be a dedicated member or anything, I’d just like to experience the content first hand. What plans do you have with the server? What content will you be adding?

Read full topic

You have the same logo template, or whatever we used, as us. Lol
[/quote]

Well I did not know, will be making a new one in that case.

What’s so special about this? Looks like any RSPS PI with newer content. Please prove that I am wrong.

Lol it’s a fresh PI. Obviously nothing new yet. Relax kid.[/quote]
Why not a non-based-winter love-server? I am completely calm. I just know you guys from R-S and I’m pretty sure that this won’t get to a hosting stage. I wish I am wrong. Otherwise, good luck
